heading: This Afternoon
temperature: Valley highs in the low to mid 60s

heading: Tonight
text: Mainly clear. Patchy valley fog, and scattered frost.
temperature: 30s, with some 20s in the cold spots, and low to mid 40s near Lake Champlain

heading: Friday
text: Patchy valley fog early, mainly east, then mostly sunny.

heading: Saturday
text: Mostly sunny after any early fog.
